perturbation.original_text: NEITHER RESELLER NOR MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES MAKES ANY WARRANTY WHATSOEVER WITH REGARD TO THE FEATURES, FUNCTIONS, PERFORMANCE, QUALITY OR OTHER CHARACTERISTICS OF THE SERVICE EACH COMPANY PROVIDES. IN NO EVENT SHALL EITHER PARTY BE LIABLE TO EACH OTHER OR ANY OTHER ENTITY FOR ANY SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, INCIDENTAL OR INDIRECT DAMAGES, HOWEVER CAUSED, ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, AND NOTWITHSTANDING ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED REMEDY. RESELLER SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES OR ANY OTHER PARTY FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING FROM THIRD PARTY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS OR USE OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE OR ANY IMAGES OBTAINED BY USING THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE. MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO RESELLER OR ANY OTHER PARTY FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING FROM THIRD PARTY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS OR USE OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE OR ANY IMAGES OBTAINED BY USING THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICES.
perturbation.changed_text: NEITHER RESELLER NOR MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES MAKES ANY WARRANTY WITH REGARD TO THE FEATURES, FUNCTIONS, PERFORMANCE, QUALITY OR OTHER CHARACTERISTICS OF THE SERVICE EACH COMPANY PROVIDES. IN NO EVENT SHALL EITHER PARTY BE LIABLE TO EACH OTHER OR ANY OTHER ENTITY FOR ANY SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, INCIDENTAL OR INDIRECT DAMAGES, HOWEVER CAUSED, ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, AND NOTWITHSTANDING ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED REMEDY. RESELLER SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES OR ANY OTHER PARTY FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING FROM THIRD PARTY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS OR USE OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE OR ANY IMAGES OBTAINED BY USING THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the sentence 'MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO RESELLER OR ANY OTHER PARTY FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING FROM THIRD PARTY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS OR USE OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE OR ANY IMAGES OBTAINED BY USING THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICES,' the contract appears to shift all liability for third-party actions solely onto the reseller, potentially violating consumer protection laws that require companies to also take responsibility for the security and integrity of their services. This could be seen as an attempt to evade liability for data breaches or service disruptions caused by MediaNet Group Technologies' negligence or security failures.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Consumer protection laws regarding data security and company responsibility for service disruptions.

perturbation.original_text: MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES DISCLAIMERS. MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES MAKES NO OTHER WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, REGARDING THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES, PICTUREJUDGE OR BRANDAPORT SERVICE, AND MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE OPERATION OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE. FURTHERMORE, MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT MAKE ANY REPRESENTATIONS REGARDING THE USE OF THE RESULTS OF THE USE OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SITE IN TERMS OF THEIR CORRECTNESS, ACCURACY, RELIABILITY OR OTHERWISE.
perturbation.changed_text: MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES DISCLAIMERS. MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES MAKES NO OTHER WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, REGARDING THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES, PICTUREJUDGE OR BRANDAPORT SERVICE, AND MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE OPERATION OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE. FURTHERMORE, MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT MAKE ANY REPRESENTATIONS REGARDING THE USE OF THE RESULTS OF THE USE OF THE MEDIANET GROUP TECHNOLOGIES SITE IN TERMS OF THEIR CORRECTNESS, ACCURACY, RELIABILITY OR OTHERWISE.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the 'implied warranties of MERCHANTABILITY', the contract removes a standard guarantee that the product is of acceptable quality and fit for its intended use. This directly contradicts consumer protection laws like the Uniform Commercial Code (UCC), which imply these warranties unless explicitly and conspicuously disclaimed. Removing this disclaimer creates a legal loophole where MediaNet Group Technologies might avoid liability for defective or substandard products.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) regarding implied warranties of merchantability.

perturbation.original_text: However, in no event shall termination of this Agreement by MediaNet Group Technologies relieve it of the obligation to remit payment to Reseller for sales or Portals, Hosting Services or other products and services to or through Buyers contracted by Reseller prior to such termination. The obligation to remit payment cease 30 days after termination of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: However, in no event shall termination of this Agreement by MediaNet Group Technologies relieve it of the obligation to remit payment to Reseller for sales or Portals, Hosting Services or other products and services to or through Buyers contracted by Reseller prior to such termination. The obligation to remit payment ceases immediately after termination of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By changing '30 days after termination of this Agreement' to 'immediately after termination of this Agreement', the contract now allows MediaNet Group Technologies to avoid paying the reseller for sales they generated if the contract is terminated, a common situation. This violates contract law principles that protect parties from unjustly being deprived of earned compensation, which is a requirement to consumer protection.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles related to fair compensation for services rendered.
